summary: The collapse of crypto exchange FTX opens opportunities for rival exchange Binance—and raises questions about the sector’s sustainability.
title: What the Hell Happened to FTX?
detailed_content: THE WORLD’S LARGEST crypto exchange, Binance, has walked away from a deal to acquire its troubled archrival, FTX, leaving the smaller company on the brink of collapse after a surge of withdrawals.
author: BY JOEL KHALILI
